humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions from " Factory " from " £èü ", " Factory " is like a rock cliff, " Factory ", "Âπø", and "ÂÆÄ" can sometimes be used in common, indicating a house, " £èü "The elephant is treating hemp with both hands ( Xu Shen, Duan Yucai), the original meaning is hemp used to weave cloth, which is a botanical name.

The bark of hemp can be used for weaving. "The Analects. "Zihan": "Mian Mian, Li Ye." Liu Baonan, "Justice": "The hemp, the hemp, the leather is made of cloth." The hemp weaving technology in the Shang and Zhou periods has reached a very high level. Textiles have appeared long ago.

There are a few talks about the initial meaning of the configuration of " linen ". One said that it is like blowing the linen (separating the linen) under the house for weaving (He Linyi). One said " Guang " Xiangshan cliff, " £èü " Xiangma , which grows on the edge of the mountain cliff (Kang Baowen, Pan Huiru). It can be understood that hemp is piled up in a warehouse (Guangzhou). Xu Shen believes that hemp is something that people manage and organize under the house. "Shuowen": "Ma, the same as hemp, the person governs under the house. Congguang, from the house. All hemp belongs to hemp." Duan Yucai's note: "Untreated is called hemp, and ruled is hemp. . Adding untreated to the name of ‚Äú cured ‚Äù is collectively referred to as ‚Äú hemp ‚Äù.‚Äù In other words, the plant that has been treated is called ‚Äú hemp ‚Äù, and the untreated plant is called ‚Äú hemp ‚Äù.

Bronze inscription is used as the surname, Shi Ma Yi Shu Ding: "Shi Ma Yi hangs (Uncle) Zha (As) Lvzhen (Ding)."

There is no lack of records of weaving and breaking hemp in ancient books, "Poetry. Chen Feng. "Dongmen Zhi Tart": "It's not numb", "Shuowen Jiezi Yizheng": "Those with numbness in the clouds, women's affairs are also." "Kaogongji": "The treatment of silk and hemp to achieve success is called female power." "Salt and Iron. Xiang Ci": "The husband treats his Tianchou, and the woman treats his numb." "Jing Shi Tong Yan": "When I walked into the door, I saw the whole family still sitting in the room, Ji Ma... Chun'er heard it, numb in her hand, and asked in her mouth : "How about the document?""

The original meaning of " linen " is the name of a plant, which is woven into linen, and the material is rough and simple, so it is made of linen. When wearing mourning clothes, hemp rope is tied to the chest, neck, and waist, which is called "fading". "The Book of Songs. Cao Feng. "Mayfly" is a mourning song, in which "Mai Yi is like snow" is Mai's white mourning gown (Shirakawa Jing). By extension, the surface is not smooth, which is also called " numbness. " If the face is full of acne, it is commonly called " numbness face." " Ma " also describes things with small details, such as sparrows. " Ma " is a fabric of poor quality. "Ma Ma Tei" in Cantonese means reluctant and passable, which is derived from this.

Basic explanation of words
hemp
m√°
There are many types of herbaceous plants, such as "hemp", "ramie", "butilon", "flax" and so on. Bark fiber is usually also called "hemp", which can be used to make rope and weaving cloth: hemp cloth. Mai. sack. hemp rope. Hemp spinning.
Refers to "sesame": sesame sauce. sesame oil.
Like the uncomfortable feeling after legs and arms are pressed: feet are numb.
Feeling unresponsive, or loss of feeling, is extended to insensitive thinking: numbness. anesthesia. insensitive.
Facial acne scars, by extension, refers to the rough surface of the object: pockmark.
With finely broken spots: sparrows. Sarcophagus.
Yu Fanluan: numbness. Hemp boiling.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªm√°ÔºΩ
["Guangyun" Mo Xiaqie, Pingma, Ming. ]
Also known as "Ma 1". Also known as "Ma 1".
(1) The general names of hemp plants include hemp, flax, ramie and so on. In ancient times, it specifically refers to cannabis. The bark fiber is long and tough, which can be used for weaving and so on.
(2) Refers to the stalk bark fiber of hemp.
(3) Hemp straps in ancient mourning clothes.
(4) Sesame. One of the ancient grains.
(5) The edict in the Tang and Song Dynasties was written on yellow and white linen paper, so it was used as the name of the edict.
(6) Describe numerous and chaotic.
(7) Scars on the face caused by smallpox or chickenpox.
(8) The surface is not flat or smooth.
(9) Refers to those with finely broken spots.
(10) Hemp flavor.
(11) Feeling numb.
(12) Use drugs to make people unconscious.
(13) Dialects. Deceived; deceived.
(14) Dialects. Bold (courageous), strong (courageous).
(15) Ancient place names. In today's northeast of Dangshan County, Anhui Province.
(16) Ancient place names. In Jiayu County, Hubei Province.
(17) Last name. In Spring and Autumn, there is a doctor Ma Ying. See "Twenty-eight Years of Zuo Zhuan¬∑Xiang Gong".
